DOC.brief_summary: This study compared the safety and tolerability profile of a higher potency investigational vaccine to that of the investigational vaccine at a lower potency dose.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Tolerability of a Higher Potency Dose of an Investigational Vaccine Among Adults 50 Years of Age and Older (V211-009)
DOC.criteria: Healthy individuals 50 years of age or older with a history of chickenpox who have not had herpes zoster Exclusion Criteria : Preexisting conditions that might affect vaccine safety such as conditions that inhibit an immune response
